about_the_game:
Enjoy the Official Soundtrack composed by Adam Skorupa!

List of tracks:

- Deep Diving Main Menu Theme (1:55)
- Deep Diving Theme #1 (2:59)
- Deep Diving Theme #2 (3:12)
- Deep Diving Theme #3 (3:43)
- Deep Diving Danger Theme (1:10)
- Deep Diving Education Theme (0:57)

The tracks are located in the game installation folder.
detailed_description:
Enjoy the Official Soundtrack composed by Adam Skorupa!

List of tracks:

- Deep Diving Main Menu Theme (1:55)
- Deep Diving Theme #1 (2:59)
- Deep Diving Theme #2 (3:12)
- Deep Diving Theme #3 (3:43)
- Deep Diving Danger Theme (1:10)
- Deep Diving Education Theme (0:57)

The tracks are located in the game installation folder.
name: Deep Diving Simulator (Official Soundtrack)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: 3.2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 670, Radeon R9 380 or equivalent with 2GB of video RAM
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: 3.2 GHz Quad Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: For QHD/4K resolutions and VR: GeForce GTX 1080, Radeon RX Vega with at least 6GB of video memory or equivalent
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: SSD for better loading performance

supported_languages:
English*, Polish, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Korean, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
